name: Get out of my cave
description:
A prototype that make you play a little demon that get bothered with the peoples in his cave, so in order to get them out he gonna take sacrifce to make them flee.

-the sacrifice will be located near the camps.

-once you picked the sacrifice just put it in the your camp where you started do that for the 3 others.

-but you have 2 min to do so or else they kill you.

ps: bare with me its my first jam but happy to participate xD
